description:
This rear rack is easy to install and adjusts to fit most bikes (except those with rear suspension or seat-stay mounted disc brake callipers). It accepts most panniers and rack packs so you can configure your cargo carrying capacity to your needs.

  • TIG-welded aluminum frame with 25kg load capacity
  • Adjustable height and chain stay width (range is 130 to 185mm)
  • Includes small and large rubberized seatstay clamps for bikes without braze-ons, extra spacers, and washers and bolts for virtually any mounting scenario
  • Easy-to-use integrated rear light mount
  • Integrated top deck provides some protection from road spray
  • Rear L-shaped leg on rack prevents panniers from rubbing on tires or spokes
  • 8mm rack tubing, for use with regular MEC pannier hooks
name: Filzer PR-4 Rear Pannier Rack
